[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/Headlines.png[/img][/align]
[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=85546]Odus[/url][/i][/b][/align]

[b][color=white]We're Safe![/color][/b]
Fears this week of a compromise have finally calmed as it has been discovered what sparked this scare was a bug with the IP history system that Hack Forums uses, brought up by someone attempting to steal accounts. If nothing else, it demonstrates how quickly the forum can lock down in cases such as this and how important it is to protect your account. [i][size=x-small][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5263387]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Site Performance Hit[/color][/b]
As a security measure against the suspected breach, many tweaks were made to the site's configuration against harmful traffic. It seems any number of these tweaks has resulted in site load times painfully slow to finish. It will take some time to identify the exact cause of the slump in performance but we ask you remain patient until then. [i][size=x-small][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5263511]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]MoTM Suspended[/color][/b]
The popular MoTM (Member of the Month) contest has been suspended following [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1320406][color=#EFEFEF][b]Froggy[/b][/color][/url]’s resignation from running the nominations and polls. The contest was previously suspended in March 2015 for several months over drama after running almost uninterrupted for over six years. It does not appear we will see it make another return. [i][size=x-small][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5257194]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/NotableThreads.png[/img][/align]
[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131]Ariana[/url][/i][/b][/align]

[b][color=white][u]Announcement Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5241907][b]Trust Scan Improvement (#3)[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Omniscient has updated the Trust Scan feature for the third time. Check out the new additions here.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5244051][b]HackerCraft Blue Award[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Omniscient has added a new award to support our official Hack Forums Minecraft server, HackerCraft. The award is currently unavailable, but may be available again for purchase in the future.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5244276][b]HackerCraft = Non-Profit[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Omniscient states that HackerCraft is a non-profit project and no payments should be sent to any staff member of the server. In great detail, Omniscient also explains other ways to support the server.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5248175][b]Award Policy Regarding Closed Accounts[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]A recent policy was created in regards to closed accounts. Users with closed accounts will automatically lose all their awards.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5258345][b]Account Security Notification[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Omniscient created a thread in regards to account security.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5258844][b]Account Security Notification #2[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]A continuation of the first thread was created. Omniscient made another thread regarding account security updating members on what is happening.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5262356][b]Account Security Notification #3[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]In the third thread created by Omniscient, Omni gave some more tips on how to secure your Hack Forums account, including forced password changes that are soon to come.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5259437][b]Account Security Roadmap[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Omniscient shared with the public a security roadmap to let users know what will soon come to help better account security.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5259356][b]Past Password Reset[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]It has been five years since the last forced password change. Omniscient has said members will be forced to do it once again soon.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5260890][b]Firewall Security[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Omniscient once again creates a thread updating the community on account breaches and has enabled a firewall to increase security.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5259373][b]$1k USD in BTC Bounty for HF Exploit[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Omniscient is offering a 1,000 bounty in BTC for anyone who can find an exploit in Hack Forums' working servers and provide proof to Omniscient.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5257194][b]MoTM Suspended[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Due to Froggy stepping down, Omniscient has suspended the MoTM contest.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5263387][b]Account Security Saga Ends[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Omniscient is pleased to announce that there was no actual exploit and Hack Forums is confirmed safe. Everything you need to know is explained here!

[b][color=white][u]Informational Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5243453][b]Tutorial Archive // Post your tutorials here (or someone else's).[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2831806][color=#99FF00][b]CypherPunk[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]The member, CypherPunk, recently created a mega-thread consisting of various different tutorials and guides from a variety of members. Interested in learning something new? Have an awesome thread to submit? Post it here. 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5238651][b][LEGENDS] Education Nation Helpdesk[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1138866][color=#EFEFEF][b]Rivalry[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]The official Hack Forums group, Legends, have come together to create a help desk in the Education Nation forum. Need help in a certain subject? Legends members will assist the best they can.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5226169][b][The Order] Free Rat Support | Reliable | Quick and Easy | 2+ Years of Experience[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2465185][color=#EFEFEF][b]Bo Burnam[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Bo Burnham has created a Rat Help desk that has recently been booming with activity.

[b][color=white][u]Entertaining Threads[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5247876][b]What will you do on $1,000,000,000,000 BITCOINS?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3076944][color=#99FF00][b]Norous[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]If you had the chance to own $1,000,000,000,000 Bitcoins, what would you do with your money?

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5247998][b]What would you do as hackforums owner?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3025684][color=#EFEFEF][b]lexors[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Ever imagine you were the owner of Hack Forums? If you had the power Omniscient has, what would you do?

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5262706][b]What's Your Favorite Ice Cream Flavor [Need 100 Users!][/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1446355][color=#EFEFEF][b]Trust[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]In the options given in the poll, what are you favorite ice cream flavors?

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3127802][b]Do you guys record your Dog's social interactions with others?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3025684][color=#EFEFEF][b]11.22.63[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Member 11.22.63 is curious to know if anyone records their dogs interactions with others.

[b][color=white][u]Contests and Giveaways[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5211248][b]Yes back again with another giveaway[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2360425][color=#EFEFEF][b]FamousHater[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]If you would like enter the chance to win a L33t, 3P1C, or Ub3r upgrade, test your luck in this giveaway hosted by FamousHater!

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5231411][b][Legends] Free $50 Upgrade/Award Giveaway[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1813061][color=#EFEFEF][b]Stazzy[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Stazzy is giving away multiple items for your Hack Forums account. Come check it out now!

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5258044][b][Upgrade Giveaway] Upgrade to 3PIC![/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2417658][color=#00AAFF][b]IronGold[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Ever wanted to upgrade to 3P1C but could not? Now is your chance! Come enter this contest hosted by IronGold!

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5261026][b][The Order] Member Upgrade / Award Contest[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2440338][color=#EFEFEF][b]Sahaj[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Sahaj is hosting a contest where users can win either an upgrade for their account or an award!

[b][color=white][u]Member Feedback Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5244161][b]2,556 day (7 year) feedback thread[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=55709][color=#EFEFEF][b]Glit͙ch[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Glit͙ch, owner of the official Hack Forums group Riptide, recently created a really, really short feedback thread.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5244415][b]My feedback to Omniscient and the HF Staff team.[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2969158][color=#EFEFEF][b]Silicon Valley[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Silicon Valley shared with the community his thoughts about the Hack Forums Staff Team.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5262417][b]Walt Disney's Staff Feedback[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1450348][color=#EFEFEF][b]Walt Disney™[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Ex-Staff member, Walt Disney™, gives the community some feedback on how being a Staff Member was, as well as why he stepped down.

[b][color=white][u]Miscellaneous[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5243317][b]Gross Gore PERMANENTLY banned from Twitch.TV[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=691918][color=#EFEFEF][b]Rita Ora ❤️[/b][/color][/url]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5245005][b]Prince Singer Dies[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3054431][color=#EFEFEF][b]$cumbag[/b][/color][/url]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5089693][b]What's everyone listening to?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1610871][color=#EFEFEF][b]Rʏᴀɴ Rᴇʏɴᴏʟᴅs ❤️[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Popular thread topic "What song are you listening to?" has recently resurfaced after being inactive in the music forum. Check out Rʏᴀɴ Rᴇʏɴᴏʟᴅs ❤️ threads to let others know what you're listening to!

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5257789][b]Victimless crimes[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1508976][color=#00AAFF][b]Abraluna[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Abraluna created a thread in the SRPP forum that has sparked some interest. Come check it out now!

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/Interview.png[/img][/align]
[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1148878]Clique[/url][/i][/b][/align]

[align=center][color=white][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]Interview[/font][/size][/color] [color=white][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]-[/font][/size][/color] [size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=712376]Jоey:[/url][/font][/size][spoiler=][align=left]
[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1148878][color=#FF69B4][b]Clique:[/b][/color][/url] Hey there and welcome to this weeks edition of the HF news. We're joined with Joey this time. Any shoutouts before we begin?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2110841][color=white][b]Jоey:[/b][/color][/url] Hi. Thanks for having me. I remember reading up on the interviews years prior and never thought I would be one to get interviewed. I would like to give a shoutout to my m8 Andy Quez. He is a dank memer.

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1148878][color=#FF69B4][b]Clique:[/b][/color][/url]  For sure! To kick this off -- how'd you even find the forum in the first place?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=712376][color=white][b]Joey:[/b][/color][/url]  I originally signed up on Hack Forums to learn more about Remote Administration Tools. At the time (2010ish), I actively played RuneScape and during this certain time period, there would always be certain YouTubers uploading videos claiming to be free iDungeon pro subscriptions, but in reality, they were a virus to hack into your RuneScape account. It really did spike interest to me about how it all came about, so I thought registering on Hack Forums would be a good starting point to learn more about these tools.

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1148878][color=#FF69B4][b]Clique:[/b][/color][/url] At what point did you want to run your own stresser? Did you read about it on the forum or did you do off site research?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=712376][color=white][b]Jоey:[/b][/color][/url] Well, I never actually committed myself to Hack Forums until late 2012. Likewise with RATs, DDoS has always sparked an interest to me. When I first started to become an actual member of the HF community and actively posting was when I get to see all of these new booters. Some that I still remember today that earn recognition are vDos (ran by Apple J4ck and Clubs) and Empire Stresser (ran by Tibit and Aeon). Those two stressers definitely motivated me to become one of the top stressers on the market some day. It was definitely not an overnight process to where I am now. It took a lot of dedication, reading, and trial/error to be where I am at today. I definitely cannot forget my old partner (MineSQL) who ran Olympus Stresser during March 2013 - July 2013 as it was a huge stepping stone for me. After we departed, I decided to make my own stresser (reBOOT) which was solely ran by me for the seven months I was on the forum until legal issues held higher priority than me being on HF. I came back to the forum in January 2016 and ever since then, I have been running a product called SynStress which is completely ran by me. I am an avid believer in doing everything myself because I view all of these projects as a way to learn more and more everyday.

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1148878][color=#FF69B4][b]Clique:[/b][/color][/url]  What a journey, seriously. If you could give some words of wisdom to new members here trying to follow what you've done, what would you tell 'em?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2110841][color=white][b]Jоey:[/b][/color][/url] It would be to be persistent in your efforts and to never give up. These are some really common clichés, but they are clichés for a reason. Not only on this forum, but anything in life, if you really want something, you will have to work at it, and you cannot afford to give up at the first signs of trouble like most people do. Use those times of hardship and struggles to become a stronger person than you previously were.

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1148878][color=#FF69B4][b]Clique:[/b][/color][/url]  Definitely. What's your opinion about all of these groups being sold?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=712376][color=white][b]Jоey:[/b][/color][/url] Well, ever since I have been back, it seems like all the groups have taken a turn for the worse. There does not seem to be any holding high quality images like there were in previous groups years ago (The Alliance, Infamous, Illuminati, etc). I believe the groups are being sold so frequently because people are not actually taking the time to invest the group to become something, but more-so, they are simply buying the group, getting a userbar/name, and letting it sit and rot. I believe that owners should definitely reflect on what I said in the question above about being persistent because what's the point of buying something that you will be selling in a few months, right?

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1148878][color=#FF69B4][b]Clique:[/b][/color][/url]  Yeah, there's no point putting in the work for it to be sold in about a month or so. You think you'll be on this site for years to come?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=712376][color=white][b]Jоey:[/b][/color][/url] For sure. Even though I do not talk to as many people as I did prior to 2013, I still enjoy the site and what it has to offer for the people. I am honestly surprised Omniscient is still kicking it strong. I definitely envy him for his dedication.

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1148878][color=#FF69B4][b]Clique:[/b][/color][/url] Glad you're still going to be active. Well that just about wraps everything up. Any final words before we finish?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=712376][color=white][b]Jоey:[/b][/color][/url] Don't let your memes be dreams.
[/align][/align][/spoiler]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

posts.message:

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/Memo.png[/img][/align]
[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=561239]iHydra[/url][/i][/b][/align]

[b][color=white]New Headers, Sections, and Changes[/color][/b]
Changes first; I have decided to merge Battlestations and Art Gallery into one new section, "Spotlight". Next up? Sections; Spotlight and Trends are two new sections we have now. Spotlight will contain battlestations, art gallery, and anything else that we'd like to showcase from our community. Trends is our entertainment section with one key ingredient, drama. Videos, music, celebrities, online and "IRL" drama - [s]TMZ[/s] Trends has you covered. Lastly, we have new headers, once again, and would like to hear some feedback on them - same colors, new design.

*New sections go live next week

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/WorldNews.png[/img][/align]
[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2110841]Night Fury[/url][/i][/b][/align]

[url=http://www.ctvnews.ca/mobile/world/russia-offers-water-bombers-specialists-to-help-fight-fort-mcmurray-fire-1.2893439][b][color=white]Russia Offers Aid to Canada[/color][/b][/url]
The Canadian province of Alberta has been dealing with the massive Fort McMurray fire which started May 1, 2016. The cause of the fire is unknown, but it has burned over 495,000 acres as of May 8, 2016. Due to the magnitude of the blaze, Russia has offered to help with some water bombers and fire fighting specialists. As of the date the offer was extended, the Canadian government has yet to respond. The two countries have been in a diplomatic standstill since Russia's annexation of Crimea. However, the prime minister of Canada has mentioned that he would like a constructive relationship with Putin's government. The Canadian government is making studies before they conclude whether to accept or reject the offer by Russia.

[url=http://news.trust.org/item/20160502111332-pv2bh/?source=hpOtherNews3][b][color=white]France Pushes for Global Regulation of Medicine Prices[/color][/b][/url]
Due to the rising prices of prescription medication, France will make an effort to convince its fellow G7 members to regulate medicine costs. This effort on France's part is due to their campaign to make life-saving drugs more accessible to the general population. The topic is on the G7 agenda for later this month, but will also be discussed in September with pharmaceutical companies potentially joining that conversation as well. Medicine costs and the patent system for medication have recently received more criticism, especially in developing countries. The G7 nations are home to most of the pharmaceutical companies, so a regulatory change among these nations would have very noticeable effect on drug prices.

[url=http://www.theguardian.com/news/2016/may/02/iceland-presidents-wife-linked-to-offshore-tax-havens-in-leaked-files][b][color=white]Wife of Iceland's President Linked to Tax Evasion[/color][/b][/url]
Dorrit Moussaieff, the wife of Iceland's president, has recently come under scrutiny due to leaked HSBC documents revealing her association to offshore companies and trusts registered outside the UK. This leak comes as part of the Panama Papers, which show her with some investment in the British Virgin Islands. Even more, documents reveal that the first lady is supposed to receive offshore inheritance when her mother dies. Lawyers of Moussaieff and a spokesperson for the president claim the couple have never been aware of each other's financial affairs. President Grímsson, Iceland's president, has previously spoken against offshore structures in his campaign leading up to next month's election.

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/TechNews.png[/img][/align]
[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=712376]Joey[/url][/i][/b][/align]

[color=white][url=http://time.com/money/4310777/comcast-data-cap-internet-customers/][b]Comcast Agrees to Raise Data Cap Limit for Internet Customers[/b][/url][/color]
The popular American Internet service provider has now spoken out about the current limitations they have imposed for their users. Previously, Comcast capped their customers 300GB of data per month. When the customer exceeds their monthly limit, they have an overage charge of $10 per each 50GB of data. As of now, Comcast have increased their data cap to 1TB. Users also have the option to pay an extra $50/month to have an unmetered plan or pay the traditional $10 per each 50GB overage fee. These changes will take effect by June 1.

[color=white][url=http://www.cnet.com/news/fbi-paid-less-than-1m-for-iphone-hack-doesnt-know-how-it-works/][b]FBI Paid Less Than $1M for iPhone Hack and Dropped Court Case With Apple[/b][/url][/color]
When you purchase something, you would want to know how it works, right? This does not seem to be a part of the FBI's concern when looking to get into locked iPhones. Originally, observers estimated that the FBI paid around $1.3 million, but at a later time, a figure of around $1 million was to be reported. The FBI purchased this hack from an undisclosed security company is also capable of getting through any security measures on the iPhone 5C models that are running the newest Apple software. Prior to the purchase of this hack, the courts demanded for Apple to create a backdoor to bypass their encrypted software. Apple refused which led many people to support the company for their decision in court; however, the case was dropped shortly after the hack was purchased. 

[color=white][url=http://www.cnet.com/news/the-government-wants-your-facebook-data-but-they-dont-want-you-to-know/][b]US government wants your Facebook data -- without your knowledge[/b][/url][/color]
With recent events such as the FBI wanting to get into locked iPhone devices, it definitely has brought up the question: What type of information does the government have access to? It appears that the government is receiving more than just information on a few iPhone devices. In the "Global Government Requests Report" that Facebook releases semi-annually, there was around a 13 percent rise in requests from government compared to the first half of the 2015 year. The government requested information from Facebook 46,763 times in the second half of the 2015 year.

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/GamingNews.png[/img][/align]
[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2364291]Buffy Summers[/url][/i][/b][/align]

[url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/fallout-4s-massive-far-harbor-expansion-gets-relea/1100-6439484/][b][color=white]Fallout 4's Third and Largest Expansion Pack Gets a Release Date[/color][/b][/url]
Bethesda announced the release date for their third and largest DLC for Fallout 4 entitled Far Harbor. Far Harbor will launch globally for PS4, Xbox One, and PC on May 19 for $25. The trailer can be viewed [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B0wSCFBJcSs]here[/url]. The expansion takes place in the post-apocalyptic version of Maine's booming tourist hot spot, Bar Harbor. The DLC begins with Detective Valentine getting a new case that leads you on a search for a missing woman in a secret colony of synths. When you arrive to Far Harbor you are alerted to the fact that the higher levels of radiation have created a more feral world than you are accustomed to. Players will be introduced to more "lethal" creatures, but will also receive higher level equipment to help you slay them in your pursuit of bringing peace to Far Harbor. Bethesda also teased fans to "stay tuned" for more to come. It is speculated that they will share more exciting news at their E3 briefing this in June. On the more immediate horizon, Bethesda will be introducing mods previously only available on PC to consoles. The "Creation Kit" currently available to PC gamers allows them to tinker with most aspects of the game. They can edit quests, characters, weapons, dialog, and much more. Some of the PC mods will become available for Xbox One this May and will follow for PS4 in June.

[url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/dead-island-definitive-collection-gets-vicious-tra/1100-6439448/][b][color=white]Dead Island: Definitive Collection Trailer[/color][/b][/url]
Deep Silver released a facetious [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UX9Y7okw_gE]trailer[/url] for the Definitive Collection Edition of Dead Island that is coming to PS4, Xbox One, and PC this May 31. The Definitive Collection will include remastered versions of the original Dead Island and Dead Island: Riptide. It will also feature a mini-game entitled Retro Revenge. The Definitive Collection Edition will be available for physical and digital purchase on May 31 for $40. On the same day, Deep Silver will release the remastered versions of Dead Island and Dead Island: Riptide separately for $20 each. In other news, Dead Island 2 has pulled through developmental hell and has resumed development under Sumo Digital. Deep Silver has teased about a "major announcement" being made at E3. It hasn't been confirmed that it will be regarding the future of Dead Island 2, but fans have remained hopeful. Either way, we're all happy that Dead Island 2 has resumed development after a lengthy hiatus.

[url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/tomb-raider-movie-casts-new-lara-croft-and-its-not/1100-6439321/][b][color=white]Tomb Raider Movie Casts Alicia Vikander As Lara Croft[/color][/b][/url]
Alicia Vikander, who won an Oscar for Best Performance by an Actress in a Supporting Role for her part in The Danish Girl, will be the next person to play Lara Croft on the big screen! Despite rumors that Daisy Ridley would take on the role, it has been confirmed that Alicia Vikander has secured her position as the new Lara Croft. The film franchise will is undergoing a total reboot since the last Tomb Raider film starring Angelina Jolie was released in 2003. Alicia Vikander has a big role to fill and I simply cannot see her comparing to Jolie. Hopefully, Vikander will surprise us all and revive the ever beloved Tomb Raider series and ensure future sequels!
